relation: Sitcom about life in the 1950s and 1960s begins an 11-year run on ABC
This novel by Peter Benchley is published

Airport named for this French leader opens in Paris
This actress becomes the youngest ever to win a competitive Academy Award
This book, Stephen King’s first published novel, is released
ABBA’s performance of this song wins them the 1974 Eurovision Contest
This slugger breaks Babe Ruth’s Major League record for most career home runs
The Carnation Revolution overthrows the authoritarian regime in this European country
This country becomes the sixth nation to detonate a nuclear device
A bomb planted by this para-military organization detonates at the Houses of Parliament in London
The first live broadcast of this radio program began on Minnesota Public Radio
This country wins the FIFA World Cup on its own soil
Turkey begins an invasion of this island nation
Philippe Petit tightrope walks for 45 minutes at this location in New York City
This US president announces his resignation.
This daredevil fails in his attempt to jump across Snake River Canyon
This artist's only American solo #1 single 'Whatever Gets You thru the Night' is released
Muhammad Ali defeats this boxer in the “Rumble in the Jungle”
This 3.2 million year-old skeleton is found in Ethiopia
This former UN Secretary General dies of lung cancer at age 65
The final episode of this sketch comedy is broadcast on BBC 2
This Australian city is nearly completely destroyed by Cyclone Tracy
Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks join this rock band
